main event: Several people in Belfast, Maine reported seeing a bright light in the sky moving rapidly in June 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as a luminous sphere that could change direction almost instantly, going straight up and disappearing or dropping down behind trees.
The object was compared to portions of lighted trees, with the witness taking photographs of the sighting.
The witness was an elderly, confused and excitable person who was considered an unreliable source.
Another witness, a Sergeant with the Maine State Police, reported seeing a disc-shaped object that was white in color and withdrew after being sighted.
The witnesses could not provide a rational explanation for the sightings.
sighted object: a luminous sphere and a disc-shaped white object
witnesses: Several civilians, including a Maine State Police Sergeant
photographs: yes, the report includes photographs taken by one of the witnesses
